languages.text: {n}Помедлив, Калькасар тихо отвечает:{/n} "Твой приговор мне ясен, Инцендия".
{n}After a moment's pause, Calcazar says quietly,{/n} "Your verdict is clear, Incendia."
languages.original_text: {n}Помедлив, Калькасар тихо отвечает:{/n} "Твой приговор мне ясен, Инцендия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hesitating for a moment, Calcazar says quietly:{/n} "Your verdict is clear to me Incendia."
{n}Hesitating for a moment, Calcazar says quietly:{/n} "Your verdict is clear to me Incendia."
{n}Hesitating for a moment, Calcazar says quietly:{/n} "Your verdict is clear to me, Incendia."

{n}After a moment's pause, Calcazar says quietly,{/n} "Your verdict is clear, Incendia."
{n}After a moment's pause, Calcazar says quietly,{/n} "Your verdict is clear, Incendia."

languages.text: {n}Après un instant de silence, Calcazar répond calmement :{/n} « Votre verdict est parfaitement clair, Incendia. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, Calcazar says quietly,{/n} "Your verdict is clear, Incendia."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un instant de silence, Calcazar répond calmement :{/n} « Votre verdict est parfaitement clair, Incendia. »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar titubea por un instante antes de responder en voz queda:{/n} «Me ha dejado claro su veredicto, Incendia».
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, Calcazar says quietly,{/n} "Your verdict is clear, Incendia."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar duda por un instante antes de responder en voz queda:{/n} «Me ha dejado claro su veredicto, Incendia».

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎犹豫片刻，之后平静地开了口。{/n}“我已经对你下达了判决，因森蒂娅。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, Calcazar says quietly,{/n} "Your verdict is clear, Incendia."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎犹豫片刻，之后平静地开了口。{/n}“对你的判决结果，我已经心里有数了，因森蒂娅。”

languages.text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause sagt Calcazar leise:{/n} "Euer Urteil ist klar, Incendia."
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, Calcazar says quietly,{/n} "Your verdict is clear, Incendia."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar zögert kurz und sagt dann leise:{/n} "Ich habe Euer Urteil verstanden, Incendia."

languages.text: {n}一瞬のためらいののち、カルカサルは静かに告げる。{/n}「インセンディア、お前の評決は明らかだ」
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, Calcazar says quietly,{/n} "Your verdict is clear, Incendia."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬のためらいののち、カルカサルは静かに告げる。{/n}「インセンディア、お前の評決は明らかだ」

languages.text: {n}Biraz duraksadıktan sonra Calcazar, sessizce cevap veriyor.{/n} "Kararın belli İncendia."
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, Calcazar says quietly,{/n} "Your verdict is clear, Incendia."
